page.title: 14ELECTRICITY IN TRELLECH.
page.content: IN THE SCHOOL THER ARE 17 PUPILS IN THE TOP CLASS AND WE CARRIED OUT A SURVEY OF PUPILS TO FIND OUT HOW MANY ELECTRICAL GADGETS THEY HAD IN THEIR HOMES ETC. 14 COOKERS:14 FRIDGES:12 MIXERS:12 ELECTRIC KETTLES:5 TOASTERS: 5 WASHING MACHINES: 3 MICROWAVE COOKERS:13 VACUM CLEANERS:14 IRONS:14 T.V'S:14 RADIOS: 14 TELEPHONES:12 CASSETTE RECORDERS:13 RECORD PLAYERS:5 VIDEO RECORDERS:13 DRILLS: 8 SANDERS: 13 MOWERS:6 BRUSH CUTTERS: 6 SAWS: 11 STRIMMERS:9 SHAVERS:2 TOOTHBRUSHES:5 COMPUTORS.
